item.title: The Journey Begins
item.description: Since this is an introductory post, I’ll keep it short and simple. This is my first blog post after shifting to a new setup of writing. I’m excited to see the journey beginning. What setup have I shifted to for my blog, and what advantages does it offer ? Lately, after playing around with a couple of static site generators (like - Metalsmith, WinterSmith, Hexo) and also deciding against the idea of building my own, I’ve finally consolidated upon Jekyll for now, primarily because of the automatic deployment and setup with GitHub.
